Original: Ah, yes, this request... It is a task
of retribution from a beginning
explorer.
[Page]
In [Color:5]B1F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0], there is
a [Color:5]wooden box[Color:0] where some leave items
for emergencies. Do you know it?
[Page]
That box is frequently the target
of [Color:5][Enemy1:6][Color:0] attacks. It is most
vexing for those who need it most.
[Page]
That is why they wish for you to
subdue the monster. The wooden box
is in the [Color:5]northern[Color:0] area of B1F.
[Page]
If you seek advice on fighting the
[Enemy1:6], that man drinking there
is quite knowledgeable on the topic.
[Page]
Take care, and I shall await your
swift return.
Translation: Ah, yes, this request... It is a task
of retribution from a beginning
explorer.
[Page]
In [Color:5]B1F[Color:0] of the [Color:5]Lush Woodlands[Color:0], there is
a [Color:5]wooden box[Color:0] where some leave items
for emergencies. Do you know it?
[Page]
That box is frequently the target
of [Color:5][Enemy1:6][Color:0] attacks. It is most
vexing for those who need it most.
[Page]
That is why they wish for you to
subdue the monster. The wooden box
is in the [Color:5]northern[Color:0] area of B1F.
[Page]
If you seek advice on fighting the
[Enemy1:6], that man drinking there
is quite knowledgeable on the topic.
[Page]
Take care, and I shall await your
swift return.

Original: Thank you for your hard work. It seems
the request is complete now.
[Page]
I have heard praise for you on the
lips of the novice explorers who pass
through here.
[Page]
So this wooden box is one of the ways
that explorers look after each other,
is it...?
[Page]
Well, thank you once more. I shall
look to secure your services again
in the future.
Translation: Thank you for your hard work. It seems
the request is complete now.
[Page]
I have heard praise for you on the
lips of the novice explorers who pass
through here.
[Page]
So this wooden box is one of the ways
that explorers look after each other,
is it...?
[Page]
Well, thank you once more. I shall
look to secure your services again
in the future.

Original: With punitive action against the
[Enemy1:6] in mind, you arrive at
the area with the wooden box.
Translation: With punitive action against the
[Enemy1:6] in mind, you arrive at
the area with the wooden box.

Original: When you look ahead, you see the
monster's back, as if jealously
guarding something! You have no doubt.
[Page]
This is the target. You mentally
review whether you are prepared to
do battle with the monster...
Translation: When you look ahead, you see the
monster's back, as if jealously
guarding something! You have no doubt.
[Page]
This is the target. You mentally
review whether you are prepared to
do battle with the monster...

Original: [Color:5]Enter battle with it?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Enter battle with it?[Color:0]

Original: As you gulp and draw your weapon,
the monster detects your presence
and turns to face you!
[Page]
But before it can make its first
move, you charge toward the beast!
Translation: As you gulp and draw your weapon,
the monster detects your presence
and turns to face you!
[Page]
But before it can make its first
move, you charge toward the beast!

Original: The monster is too busy with its
prize from the box to notice you.
[Page]
You survey the situation, waiting for
the perfect opportunity to attack...
Translation: The monster is too busy with its
prize from the box to notice you.
[Page]
You survey the situation, waiting for
the perfect opportunity to attack...

Original: The monster cries out and collapses
on the spot, felled by your assault!
The request is now complete!
[Page]
You examine the wooden box and see
food, likely left by somebody, inside.
The box itself seems undamaged.
[Page]
You clean up the box's interior before
leaving to make your report of the
request's fulfillment.
Translation: The monster cries out and collapses
on the spot, felled by your assault!
The request is now complete!
[Page]
You examine the wooden box and see
food, likely left by somebody, inside.
The box itself seems undamaged.
[Page]
You clean up the box's interior before
leaving to make your report of the
request's fulfillment.
